title: What is Elmo technology in the classroom? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s a document camera:  Elmo is a company that makes document cameras. You can do the same thing with an iPad, a mount, and a projector. That’s what I use:   Those pictures are from 2018. I included them in this answer: Matthew Bates's answer to School teachers on Quora - Do you teach through PowerPoint? Are there any advantages when compared to traditional chalk/ marker based teaching methods? Since then, I’ve bought a giant screen for my classroom, so I don’t have to project onto paper. An iPad has a huge advantage over an Elmo: You can use it to project more than just documents. I use mine to project youtube videos a lot.

NOT this (pity!):  Electronic gizmos that try to increase interaction in the classroom, This is a document projector:  It looks to me like there were huge plans, and the company didn’t get off the ground with much other than a large line of document projectors.
